snippet.title: Compass Point: West official trailer - out now! | Next Games
snippet.description:
Compass Point: West is a rootin’ tootin wild west adventure - Build, Collect and Battle your way to dominance on the western frontier! Collect your own deck of sidekicks and battle against the evil takeover plans of Orville Driller and his henchmen. All in glorious 3D!! 

You can download for free on the App Store, here: http://nxtg.ms/westgame 
Facebook - facebook.com/compasspointwest
Twitter - twitter.com/compassptwest
Youtube - youtube.com/nxtgms

Saddle up, it’s time for a showdown!

..::: Collect cards and build your posse of wild west gunslingers :::..

The frontier is a rough and tumble place. Your help is needed to grow and protect a brand spankin’ new western town on the edge of the frontier. Villains lurk in the shadows, their greed for oil and power know no bounds. Join your friends and saddle up for an epic adventure!

..::: Game Features :::..

*** BUILD a thriving western town
*** BATTLE Wild West outlaws & other players
*** COLLECT and upgrade character cards
*** CLAIM your stake and free towns
*** PLAY your way- horizontally or vertically

Explore the open frontier as you free other towns from the corrupt outlaws of Orville Driller’s evil oil empire!

Build and run your own Wild West outpost alongside the town Sheriff and recruit trusty sidekicks to protect it. Don’t let Orville Driller and his henchmen get their filthy hands on all that black gold flowing beneath your lands.

Facebook - facebook.com/compasspointwest
Twitter - twitter.com/compassptwest
Youtube - youtube.com/nxtgms

“In a world full of brave heroes and dangerous outlaws. 

One man, with a smile that could charm the spines off a cactus, and the courage to keep our town safe. 

There’s Allie-May! If there ever was an angel in this dusty town, she’s it. 

She tends to the kind folk that live here. 

Speaking of kind folk, this here fella may act tough, but he’s really just a big old softie. 

Everyone plays cards here, it’s part of the game. 
Some have been panning for gold a bit too long round these parts, if you get my drift. 

But there’s always room for a little crazy on the battle field. 

They call this pretty lass TNT Sally. If you need to know why, well, you must be on her good side. 

There are plenty of uncharted lands to explore, but watch out for old Orville. He’s trying to keep everything for himself. That’s where y’all come in. 

Coz doggarn it all, somebody’s gotta stop him. 

Saddle up, it’s time for a showdown! Compass Point: West! Available in the App Store.”
